title: MoodTracks
description: Interactive Front-End Application that tracks your personal mood and accompanies it with a playlist along with positive affirmations.

title: Postcode Guardian
description: A web application designed to provide users with comprehensive insights into specific areas by using two server-side APIs.

title: Eurovision Quiz!
description: A fun little quiz based around Eurovision, utilising the skills we learned with JavaScript.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Application utilising jQuery to create a Work Day Schedule using local.storage and day.js.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Application using a third-party API to collect data not only on today's weather forecast, but collecting data on the 5 Day Forecast also.

title: Password Generator
description: A webpage to create their own unique password from an array of letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers and special characters.

title: CourseConnect
description: This project implements a web form with validation for name, email, and credit/debit card number inputs.

title: Horiseon Code Refactor
description: This repository aims to simplify, condense and streamline both the existing HTML and CSS so that the remaining code has ease of use and can be easily read/edited for further use.
